parameters.name: Operations
parameters.query:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| summarize Count = count() by Operation
| order by Count desc, Operation asc
| project Value = Operation, Label = strcat(Operation, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| where ExchangeMetaData_From_s != ""
| summarize Count = count() by ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| order by Count desc, ExchangeMetaData_From_s asc
| project Value = ExchangeMetaData_From_s, Label = strcat(ExchangeMetaData_From_s, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| extend policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where policy != ""
| summarize Count = count() by policy
| order by Count desc, policy asc
| project Value = policy, Label = strcat(policy, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = O365DLP_CL
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or ExchangeMetaData_From_s in ({Users})
| where "{Policy:label}"=="All" or tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName) in ({Policy})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams');
data
| summarize Count = count() by Workload_s
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Workload_s:string)['Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams']) on Workload_s
| project Workload_s = iff(Workload_s == '', Workload_s1, Workload_s), Count = iff(Workload_s == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Workload_s)
    on Workload_s
| project-away Workload_s1, CreationTime_t
| extend Workload_s = Workload_s
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend Workload_s = 'All', Workload_ss = '*'    
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10

let data = O365DLP_CL
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| where Policy != ""
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}");
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Policy
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Policy
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Policy
| order by TotalCount desc, Policy asc
| project Policy, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId , Policy
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Policy, UserId
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Policy, UserId
| order by TotalCount desc, Policy asc
| project Policy, UserId, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Policy
| project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'UserId', ['Policy Count'] = TotalCount, Trend,  ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Policy, Type = 'Policy', ['Policy Count'] = TotalCount,  Trend)
| order by ['Policy Count'] desc, Name asc

let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}")
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Policy' and Policy == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Amount = count() by Policy, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now()) 
| sort by Amount
content.title: Policy Hits over time

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL 
| extend Rule = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].RuleName)
|extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}")
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Rule' and Rule == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Rule, UserId, Policy, TimeGenerated
content.title: DLP Rules

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL 
| extend exception = ExceptionInfo_Reason_s
| extend Rule = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].RuleName)
| extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where exception != ""
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}")
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Rule' and Rule == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Rule
content.title: Requested exceptions per rule

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL 
| extend Severity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].Severity)
| extend Subject = ExchangeMetaData_Subject_s
| extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}")
| where Policy != '' 
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Policy' and Policy == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Subject, Severity, UserId, Policy, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by Number, TimeGenerated
content.title: e-mail details

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL
| extend severity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].Severity)
| extend exception = ExceptionInfo_Reason_s
| extend Rule = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].RuleName)
| extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where exception != ""
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}")
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Policy' and Policy == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Rule , severity, exception, UserId, reason = ExceptionInfo_Justification_s, Policy, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by Number, TimeGenerated
content.title: DLP Exception Information

content.query:
let data = OfficeActivity
| where "{Operations:lable}"=="All" or Operation in ({Operations})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where OfficeWorkload in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or OfficeWorkload=="{SelectedWorkload}");
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Operation
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Operation
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Operation
| order by TotalCount desc, Operation asc
| project Operation, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by SourceFileExtension , Operation
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Operation, SourceFileExtension
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Operation, SourceFileExtension
| order by TotalCount desc, Operation asc
| project Operation, SourceFileExtension, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Operation
| project Id, Name = SourceFileExtension, Type = 'SourceFileExtension', ['Operations Count'] = TotalCount, Trend,  ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Operation, Type = 'Operation', ['Operations Count'] = TotalCount,  Trend)
| order by ['Operations Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: e-mail operations

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
let data = O365DLP_CL
| extend Severity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].Severity)
| extend Subject = ExchangeMetaData_Subject_s
| extend UserId = ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams') and ("{SelectedWorkload}"=="All" or Workload_s=="{SelectedWorkload}")
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Policy' and Policy == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| extend PolicyName = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| summarize Calls = count() by App = ExchangeMetaData_From_s, Request = PolicyName, Dependency = Workload_s
| extend RequestId = strcat(App, '::', Request);
let links = data
| summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by App, RequestId
| project SourceId = App, TargetId = RequestId, Calls, Kind = 'App -> Request'
| union (data
    | project SourceId = RequestId, TargetId = Dependency, Calls, Kind = 'Request -> Dependency');
let nodes = data
| summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by App
| project Id = App, Name = App, Calls, Kind = 'App'
| union (data
    | summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by RequestId, Request
    | project Id = RequestId, Name = Request, Calls, Kind = 'Request')
| union (data
    | summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by Dependency
    | project Id = Dependency, Name = Dependency, Calls, Kind = 'Dependency');
nodes
| union (links)
